name: Brickyard Craft Kitchen & Bar
address: 23 Park Pl, New York, NY 10007, USA

reviews.text: Bri and Lorraine were the greatest bartenders, I wish they were here every day! Food was amazing and service was 10/10. Could not have asked for a greater time.
Amintta is great!
Amintta is a great server! Would definitely come back!

Okay, can we talk about how amazing Benny is?! From the second we sat down, he had the best vibe ‚Äî super friendly, funny, and somehow managed to keep up with a packed bar without missing a beat. Our drinks came out fast and the food was delicious!

He kept checking in just enough to make sure we were good, but never hovered ‚Äî honestly, it felt like we had a friend working behind the scenes making sure our night went smoothly. You can tell he genuinely enjoys what he does because his energy is contagious.

By the end of the night, everyone at our table was talking about how great he was. If you go to this bar, do yourself a favor and ask for Benny. You‚Äôll get great service, great laughs, and he will definitely become your favorite server! I will be coming back!
The best!
Best sports bar in the city

Best service
Amazing food
Happy hour price and drinks were just fine
Fun place to relax after work. The staff is thoughtful and make you feel like you‚Äôre a local. Drinks are responsibly priced and the food is tasty.
Had the most amazing experience. The food and drinks were great. We had a great experience with Amintta, she was attentive and beyond pleasant. Very much would recommend and will be back!

My boyfriend and I came here for the first time as Michigan fans. Our server, Benny, was the most sweetest, realest, most amazing person ever!!! We‚Äôre definitely coming back just for him! Also, the drinks??? AMAZING. Thank you again Benny for making our experience one to remember!!
Amintta was our waitress and she was so sweet and respectful.  The food was amazing and the atmosphere was so family like.  Would def come back and recommend for everyone!

I need y'all to know Benny makes this place worth coming back to EVERYTIME. Yes the food and drinks are good but the service he provides is top tier!. He is friendly, attentive,funny,and his suggestions are never wrong. Trust his insight. Come here and ask yourself "what would Benny do" and then do that

Benny is hands down the best ! He‚Äôs super attentive & friendly with amazing customer service, definitely makes the experience super pleasant & the atmosphere/music is fun, will definitely be back ! The strawberry margarita is a 10/10
Love it! Staff was AWESOME and food and drinks were delicious

Great atmosphere, great music, great vibe, great wait staff! We had several servers who were very attentive to us, and were on top of getting the plates and napkins cleaned up and getting us our drinks or anything we needed. Never had to look around for a server :)
Amazing drinks and atmosphere
Good

The main server was great, however front of house was rude. Sat for two hours and then TOLD to move along as seat was apparently reserved however these were not reserved at all. If we were spoken to better we wouldn‚Äôt of minded but being told to after 2 hours of spending money was awful
Loved Olivia! Incredible service
Benny was the BEST!!
Love Benny
Olivia was great, super attentive and engaging! Highly recommend
Olivia‚Äôs the best! So sweet
Olivia took great care of us!!! Highly recommend her as a server :)))
Olivia was so great! Good service & good vibes.
This was one of the best places I‚Äôve ever been. The service was top tier. Anna my waitress was the kindest soul ever. I can only recommend this place. :)
Great attentive staff.  Lots of drink and food choices.  Great place to watch the games.

Very spacious sports bar. I‚Äôve been working next to this place for 2 years and never went in. Today was the day and I had the best customer service from Benny ! He was perfect and knew the exact recommendations I needed. Love him down coming back again!
Absolutely love this spot, they never disappoint. The food and service is always outstanding! I'd definitely recommend whether its for lunch or dinner.
Nayum was amazing. Very attentive and kind. This is a great sports bar.
Benny was our server and he was amazing!!!! Love him will come back just for Benny and of course go blue!!
Olivia has been wonderful the whole time we have been here - Tommy
Eine sehr gro√üe Auswahl an Bieren

As a POC, this place is severely lacking diversity in its patrons. But, I will give them grace considering their location.
Their service is amazing, the food has never failed me.
Specifically, Benny is the most amazing and attentive server in the establishment. Even when busy, he remembers you, your order and tries to make your experience special. I‚Äôve spent hours here and have watched him rip and run during his shift while still finding time to stop & give his undivided attention to every annoying ‚Äúwhere‚Äôs the restroom‚Äù and ‚Äúdo you have repasado?‚Äù. He is a huge plus to this place and I will continue coming back as long as he‚Äôs here! Ask for Benny!

Also, it‚Äôs loud as hell. Ofc that‚Äôs expected, but thought I‚Äôd make that clear.
Benny blessed with the service it was a vibe !!!

Olivia was awesome! She was so friendly and knowledgeable. Olivia came to my table frequently to make sure myself & my guests were okay! I will definitely be telling people about Brickyard & service by Olivia!
Amazing place to grab a drink and catch a game! I came here to get happy hour with my coworker and had a great time. Olivia was an amazing and attentive server!
Olivia was great! Highly recommend this place due to her service. We were a party of 20 and she took care of us all alone. She definitely did a great job.
Thank you to my brother for a phenomenal time with good friends and family. Drinks were amazing  - Thank you Nayum!!!
Just a solid place for decent food and drinks. It‚Äôs a great sport watch experience if you need a table for 4 plus. Service was surprisingly on point for the number of people there.
Best bar in FiDi
Great place!
Excellent place, have been coming for few years now. Wonderful bar.
Love it, great place to go after work. Great staff!!! Especially Amintta üôåüíó took great care of us(:
Roleggio, Benny and Bri were amazing!!!! Great food great music great people great energy loving atmosphere
The service is great, staffs Benny , Rollegio and Bri were amazing and engaging. Provided outstanding customer service. I love Benny so much ‚ù§Ô∏è
Loved the food n the drinks
Drinks were amazing after work!! Benny was the best server ever!!!!! Definitely coming back!!!
BENNY WAS AMAZING EXTREMELY KIND and honestly a great VIBES ü•≥ü•≥
Benny was sooo AWSOME.

‚≠ê First time in New York City, and I decided to try out a popular restaurant and bar for happy hour. It did not disappoint!

‚ú® The customer service was top-notch‚Äîfriendly, attentive, and welcoming.
üçπ Drinks were served right on time, and the quality was excellent‚Äîfresh, balanced, and absolutely worth it.
üéâ Overall, it was a great experience and the perfect way to kick off my NYC visit.

Amazing atmosphere, Benny is the BEST server hands down, attentive, friendly, funny, and informative. Love that there is happy hour until 8pm everyday. Food options are vast and has something for everyone. Air conditioning on this very hot day was on point. Busy hours are from 430-6pm, here on a Monday and service was not lacking at all. Going to make a regular spot!!!

This place is a hidden gem. The happy hour menu is an amazing deal with $12 Moscow mules and margaritas, and our server Benny was really the best. This would be a great spot to watch sports or a fun evening out with the work crew.
Pretty cool spacious bar, plenty of seating, friendly bar tenders, try the pumpkin beer if you like some spice in your life ;) great happy hour selection

Benny is amazingggggg! He‚Äôs so sweet, funny, and has the best personality! The food came out quick and it was so good! We didn‚Äôt have a reservation and they still found room for us, great atmosphere for a sports bar vibe!
Mac and cheese balls were so good. And the screwball shots were so yummy. Best part though was our wonderful waiter Benny. Very attentive and sweet.

Brickyard Craft Kitchen & Bar is a gem that truly stands out! From the moment you walk in, you're enveloped in a great atmosphere ‚Äì it's lively without being overwhelming, and just the right amount of cozy. But what really sets this place apart is the incredible food. Forget typical bar bites; their menu is full of delicious, well-crafted dishes that will surprise and delight you.
And let's talk about the incredible staff. Every single person we interacted with was friendly and efficient, making for a seamless experience. A special shout-out to our waitress (I wish I caught her name!) who was simply sweet and incredibly attentive, anticipating our needs and making us feel genuinely welcome. Brickyard Craft Kitchen & Bar is a must-visit for anyone looking for a fantastic night out with delicious food and top-notch service.

If you are a sports fan, this is a great spot to watch anything you like. It's big and spacious, with lots of screens and an array of draft beers!

I came in on a Wednesday afternoon to finish sending a few emails and sip a Blue Moon, and I will definitely come back on a Friday with the rest of the Supp team for a weekly debrief and some beers!

I look forward to trying the wings!

Oh my GOD. Came in here randomly and I LOVE this spot!! Our waiter was so helpful! Super funny and their service was incredible. The drinks were strong and I loved it here. Great place it be with your friends and catch a vibe.

Went yesterday night for my son's birthday, we had a wonderful time. Everyone very nice and the food is delicious üòã. We had a couple of drinks and a few appetizers. Garlic Parmesan wings nice and crispy, Mac and cheese balls nice size and very good, sweet and spicy shrimp my husband and son enjoyed, chicken tenders my daughter loved and the mozzarella sticks both my daughter's enjoyed. As for entrees the steak and fries was ordered along with the chicken in a pita, grilled chicken sandwich and street style steak tacos. All I have to say is delicious üòã. We will be returning.

If you‚Äôre looking for that true local bar vibe (and prices!) in the middle of Lower Manhattan‚Äôs sea of expensive spots, this is the place. My bartender remembered me and my order after just one visit ‚Äî the staff is welcoming and accommodating, creating such a warm culture. The happy hour is solid, and the prices are more than reasonable for the area.
It‚Äôs become me and my friends‚Äô go-to post-work hangout. Great food, great drinks, and service that makes you want to keep coming back. Highly recommend.

I recently had a fantastic dining experience at the restaurant, largely due to Benny's exceptional service. From the moment we walked in, he greeted us with a warm smile and an inviting demeanor that made us feel right at home. Benny was incredibly attentive, ensuring our drinks were always full and checking in on us at just the right moments without being intrusive. His extensive knowledge of the menu helped us select dishes that were not only delicious but also
Great place to eat and have lunch or dinner or some drinks. I come Mondays for lunch and grab the NY steak and fries üëåüèº great customer service.

Took a colleague out for lunch.  Seated right away, then waitress disappeared.  Took forever to order.  The food was good, but the personal pizza came out five minutes before the other entree.  No follow up by the waitress to see if we needed anything, and then had to track her down to ask for the check.  Then came the biggest shock... $6.50 for a soda.  Wasn't even offered a refill.  When I asked the waitress if that was correct, she responded she doesn't make the prices.  Will definitely think twice about going back.

The owner is very attentive and involved. Always making sure everyone has a good time. His daughters are the best when it comes to getting orders in quick and timely. The whole restaurant is amazing. The food is top quality and the drinks are so good. The bar is awesome when there‚Äôs a great game playing.

The food was great and the atmosphere was fun and refreshing! However, the waitress Brianna didn‚Äôt treat us with the proper attitude and respect. We felt the customary service was lacking. Disappointed with the waitress, but the manager, Athena, was very kind and welcoming. I gave the service one star for Athena, zero stars for Brianna.

Had a great experience at this place. Good vibes, a zillion taps, and lots of TV's. Staff was great and dealt with a group of terrible customers quite professionally --- it's amazing what some people think is appropriate behavior and credit to the staff for taking it in stride. Take other recent negative reviews with a grain of salt, and know that Nadia at the bar and our server Anna were great. Definitely recommend

Great atmosphere and excellent food. Very close to my job. During my recent visit on 07/22, even after leaving a $10 cash tip, I was still charged an additional $5 to my debit card from my total amount. I am dissatisfied with this dishonesty. I definitely recommend that others keep their receipts and be cautious.
The people here treat us like family. The staff are so amazing, I love coming here. Also highly recommend the pizzas!

We stopped in for a work party. We were seated immediately. Unfortunately, we had to split the party into two tables. Service was prompt getting our drink orders. When it came time to order our meals, we felt a bit rushed. I ordered the salmon with mashed potatoes and mixed veggies. The food was delivered fairly quickly, and it was as ordered and tasty. The atmosphere was pleasant, not too loud, or crowded. We were a bit too close to the bus station, which was a bit of a bother at times. It was a bit pricey to me for the type of eatery it is, but I would return and try some of the other plates.

Sports bar of my dreams! I used to live in New York and prayed that there was a sports bar as amazing as Brickyard. I was in town visiting and wanted a place to watch Sunday football and a friend recommended this to me. Not only is this is truly a question as a sports bar with TVs lining the walls of the entire place. But the food is delicious, the drinks feel like you are at a craft cocktail bar (I mean what sports bar serves lychee martini is and they were very tasty). Also, the service was exceptional. Erica was our server, she was very helpful and kind. The manager was also super accommodating when a few of our party was late. I took some pictures of the food, I‚Äôm not a food blogger, so they‚Äôre not the greatest photos but just wanted to point out I‚Äôll get the food was. I will be here every Sunday if I still lived in the city! Ps best chicken tenders I‚Äôve ever had!

Absolutely love this place. The staff here make the experience, whether it‚Äôs Anna, Benny or Nayum. They keep the jokes and drinks coming, food is amazing and happy hour prices are very reasonable. Easy 10/10! Never a wait!
The drinks were amazing and the costumer service was perfect 10/10!! The host was handsome and had a lot of jokes. I would def recommend this spot to some friends in the future
It was a good place overall! Liked the drinks especially purple glaze if you like a sweet drink, not that strong!

I had such a great time at Brick Oven! Benny was the best host, he kept me and my friends engaged the entire time. Very attentive, you can tell he loves what he does. He displays a lot of managerial skills! Definitely the after work spot to go to!!

If you're into sports, this place is perfect for catching your favorite games. The venue is roomy and comfortable, featuring plenty of screens and a wide selection of draft beers. I‚Äôm already planning to return with the rest of the Supp team for our weekly catch-up over some cold drinks!
We stumbled across this gem and were pleasantly pleased! Delicious and fresh wings and fries. Spinach Dip a must try! Nayum is a friendly and welcoming server

Had a great time with my girls at happy hour on a Friday after work! Benny made sure we had our drinks filled and he checked up on us throughout the night. The food is great, too. Highly recommend
for a night out or for after work drinks!!

Had such a great experience at Brickyard NYC ‚Äî and Benny was a big reason why! He was absolutely amazing. We came during the Knicks Game 3, it was packed but he was super attentive, kind, and made sure we were well taken care of the entire time. You can tell he really cares about the guests having a good time. Definitely ask for Benny if you‚Äôre planning to visit ‚Äî he made our night!
Essen und Bier waren gut, Atmosph√§re ebenso.

Albeit short, this place is buzzing with great atmosphere, huge amount of screens, and good food.
Their sister bar is the All Star on 57th. Don't miss either!

Wow I am from Cali & stopping by the BrickYard gave me & my friends a glorious moment to share together. Air ventilation , strong drinks, tons of restrooms, & plenty of jumbo screens to catch the games. Definitely a staple.

Great food, drinks and vibes. Amazing service. Benny our server was sweet, hilarious and made us feel at home.

Definitely go and check them out.

Benny was amazing! Super attentive, detailed, and made sure everything was perfect from start to finish. Friendly, professional, and genuinely awesome he made our experience so much better. Can‚Äôt recommend him enough!

Omg when you come here please ask for Benny! He is absolutely amazing. He is so welcoming and suggested the best dishes on the menu to order. I had the mac and cheese balls fried crispy, margherita pizza, and ny strip and fries. The steak was great! Thank you Benny for your fabulous service üòä‚ù§Ô∏è.

Overall it‚Äôs a typical sports bar. Loud music over voices and a million screens for sports. My expectations were low for food given that its a sports bar but if you want food with your drink and friends to fill you up while you watch a game, don‚Äôt come here.

I ordered wings and not only were half of my wings raw inside (check photos) but they charged a $1 extra for a small cup of ranch and $2 extra for a small plate of celery. I assume they cook the flats and sticks together but the drumsticks are so thick that the meat doesn‚Äôt cook all the way through.

All in all it was $20 bucks for 8 pieces of half cooked chicken, some sauce and some watery and warm celery sticks. Find somewhere else to eat if you can.
